full.name: Voxtral Mini 3B (Full)
full.description: Full precision model - Best quality, requires ~20-30GB RAM during loading (CPU loading: 10-30 min)

memory_requirements.load_time_cpu: 10-30 minutes (use NVIDIA GPU for faster loading)

quantized.name: Voxtral Mini 3B (4-bit Quantized)
quantized.description: 4-bit quantized model - 75% less memory usage (NVIDIA GPU required, auto-falls back to full precision on Mac/CPU)
